captions.text: From November 19th through December 6th, a new range of Limited Edition Zero Punctuation
Merchandise is available from sharkrobot.com, including t-shirts, hoodies, hats, limited
quantities of enamel pins and, uh, an ugly sweater it says here. Go to sharkrobot.com
slash zero punctuation for the complete range. Free shipping for US orders over $60,
international over 100. Use coupon code BLACKFRIDAY18 before November 26th to get
15% off. All going away on December 6th, why are you still here, you bastards?
